channel.title: New security idea
channel.description: Okay so I saw a thread on here that sort of gave me this idea. You know how like cnet and various other sites have a "download manager". Where all downloadable material is went through these managers. Now supposedly, these managers somehow have a mcafee scanner or something of that sort in it (I don't know the details somebody feel free to elaborate more for me ), opinion on something like this for MSCP? We have several new downloads every day in server downloads and the alike yet sometimes (normally maybe one every other day there is a malicious item.

item.title: New security idea
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:14, topic:431817”]There are multiple ways to infect someone… how do you plan on stopping them all?[/quote]I never said it would be a sure fine way. It would though minimize it at least to a certain extent. You can always take every precaution possible.

Read full topic

item.title: New security idea
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:12, topic:431817”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=534520.msg3907989#msg3907989 date=1328411297]
Development wouldn’t be too hard. Simple C# should suffice, the thing is where is the scanner scanning from/where is the customer/person going to download from.
[/quote]wasn’t there a mopar tool bar or something?[/quote]
I don’t believe there was…

Read full topic

item.title: New security idea
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Unless we had a file server, there are so many different websites to download files from. Our ‘virus scanner’ would have to actually download each file…

Read full topic

item.title: New security idea
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:3, topic:431817”]No just no,
People will think it’s safe and not watch out anymore,
much viruses can’t be detected, even simple ones like a batch virus, same with payed keyloggers ect

at least now people (I hope) watch out when they downloaded something[/quote]
people still take precaution when downloading something

Read full topic
